content: I agree with you. it is important to ensure that the use of technology in agriculture is balanced with ethical considerations and the needs of smaller farmers. while there are potential downsides to automation, it also has the potential to make farming more efficient, sustainable, and profitable in the long run. it is important to carefully consider the benefits and drawbacks of automation and to ensure that technology is used in a way that is both effective and responsible. governments, industry leaders, and farmers all have a role to play in shaping the future of agriculture and ensuring that it is a sustainable and equitable industry for all.
